ValidationRule.description: The enrollment record lookup field can't be edited after the opp is created
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
and( $User.Bypass_Validation__c = false,
or( left( RecordTypeId , 15) = left( $Label.RT_Opp_TraditionalEnrollment , 15), left( RecordTypeId , 15) = left( $Label.RT_Opp_ChannelEnrollment , 15), left( RecordTypeId , 15) = left( $Label.RT_Opp_Additional_Semester , 15) ),
ischanged( Enrollment_Record__c ),
not(isblank(priorvalue(Enrollment_Record__c))) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Enrollment Record field can't be changed.
